name: Sarah Chen

bullets: I did a lot of coding and stuff, like building things and fixing bugs. Sometimes I worked with other people, and we had meetings where we talked about what to do next. I also used GitHub to save my code.
There was this one time when the website went down, and I had to fix it. It was really stressful, but I managed to get it working again. My boss said I did a good job.
I also helped some new people who joined the team. They didn’t know much about React, so I showed them how to use it. I think they learned a lot from me.
At this job, I did both frontend and backend work. I used JavaScript for the frontend and Python for the backend. I also worked with databases, but I can’t remember which ones.
We launched a product, and it was pretty successful. I don’t know the exact numbers, but it made a lot of money. I was responsible for some of the features, but I don’t remember which ones.
I also worked with AWS, but I’m not sure what I did exactly. I think I set up some servers and used S3 for storage. It was a while ago, so I don’t remember the details.

achievements: I got a patent for something I worked on, but I don’t remember what it was called.
I passed some Google Cloud certification, but I don’t use it much anymore.
I have a GitHub account with some projects, but I haven’t updated them in a while.

name: James Okafor

bullets: I manage a big budget for ads, but I’m not sure how much it is. We run campaigns on Facebook, Google, and other platforms. Sometimes they work, and sometimes they don’t.
I have a team of people who work for me. I tell them what to do, and they do it. We have meetings every week to talk about what’s going on.
I also look at data to see how the campaigns are doing. I use Google Analytics, but I don’t really understand all the numbers. I just look at the graphs and try to figure it out.

achievements: I won an award for a campaign, but I don’t remember what it was called.
I increased social media engagement for a big client, but I don’t know by how much.
I have a Google Analytics certificate, but I don’t use it much.

name: Maria Gonzalez

bullets: I take care of patients in the ER. It’s really busy, and sometimes I don’t know what to do, but I try my best.
I helped make a new system for triage, but I don’t remember how it works. It’s supposed to make things faster, but I’m not sure if it does.
I also train new nurses. I show them how to do things, but I don’t have a formal training program. I just tell them what I know.

achievements: I won an award for being a good nurse, but I don’t remember what it was called.
I made some materials for patients in Spanish and English, but I don’t know if they’re still being used.
I have a certification for emergency nursing, but I don’t remember what it’s called.

name: Amina Al-Mansoori

bullets: I make curriculums for schools. I don’t know how many schools use them, but I think it’s a lot. I work with other people to make them, but I don’t remember their names.
I also train teachers. I show them how to use the curriculum, but I don’t have a formal training program. I just tell them what I know.
I got a grant for a project, but I don’t remember how much it was for. It was for digital literacy, but I don’t know the details.

achievements: I won an award for something, but I don’t remember what it was called.
I wrote a book about education, but I don’t remember the title.
I’m certified to teach in Arabic and English, but I don’t remember the certification name.
